titles.title: Relative to the President's program of program cuts and tax increases.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

bill.summary: 6/30/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that no action should be taken on any legislative proposal on the President's economic program unless it is a unified package containing offsets for any additional expenditures through cuts in programs or increased taxes.
